text: Cun ʙo Alloh ahdu pajmon ʙasted jo ki ʙo mardum, pas agar on ahdu pajmonaton muxolifi kitoʙi Alloh va sunnati pajomʙar naʙosad, ʙa on vafo kuned va cun savgand xurded ʙa'di ta'kid soxtan, onro nasikaned, ki sumo Allohro ʙar xudaton nigahʙon gardonidaed va hamono Alloh medonad, ki ci mekuned. Va har kasero muvofiqi nijat va maqsadas cazo xohad dod
